channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car left, 21st November
item.description:
Somebody in our street told us the car broke down. Was pushed to the side everything was removed including the battery, there it still is and the doors have been left unlocked.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Briset Road, Eltham

item.title: Noisy metal cover, 21st November
item.description:
I have reported this twice before. It’s a deafening noise. If nothing done next week, I will write to Stuart Love, Westminster’s chief executive. This is not a complex issue.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 57-61, Mortimer Street, Mayfair, City of Westminster
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light continually flickering, 21st November
item.description:
This street light is flickering constantly. Comes through into bedroom at care home. Very disconcerting and confusing for residents. If you can fix would be much appreciated.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park, Greater London

item.title: Street lamp bulb is twitching, 21st November
item.description:
The bulb is going or has now gone. My wife is nervous about walking home as it now very dark opposite the alley behind our flat. This has been flickering for the last few days, but has now started going off and on again periodically
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Tudor Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked over dropped kerb and driveaway, 21st November
item.description:
This is the 2nd time this week someone's parked across my drive, making it impossible to get my car in or out. I've reported both to the council with car details but had no response. Today the car in question has been parked here for 5 hours, its not been claimed by street residents so far (contacted street whatsapp)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, Lanercost Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous flashing lighting on dark walkway, 21st November
item.description:
The lighting on this pathway only flashes on via motion sensor. The light is very bright and goes out straightaway, rendering the path users unable to see anything at all. It made me nauseous and unsure of my footing. People will get hurt because of this and it is appalling it hasn't been fixed yet in the several months since it was installed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, King Stairs Close, Bermondsey, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop 18958 chislehurst rd, 21st November
item.description:
BUS stop for 61 Bus South bound number 18958 CALLED WILLET WAY BUS STOP had been badly damaged Face plate removed put behind telegraph post (See picture)What's left of face plate covered in graffiti .The damage is now 6 months old .NEW FACE PLATE COVERING NEW TIMETABLE URGENTLY REQUIRED .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chislehurst Road, Petts Wood, Orpington, London Borough of Bromley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thames Water works, 21st November
item.description:
There are Thames Water works at this location. There are vehicle movement restrictions. These are being ignored which is causing dangerous situations to all road users. Vehicles are ignoring the restrictions, driving though coned off areas which is endangering all road users. This needs to be enforced or there will be a serious accident at this location.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bromley Common, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
